participant_1.background:
I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.
I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.
I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip!
I have my number and my freedom.

participant_2.background:
I've never told my parents that I'm not a morning person.
i make pottery.
i take fridays off in the summer.
i like to go out to eat.
I am from the Midwest, where we love our sweet treats and hip hop.

content.text: I'm good just got back from making pottery. How about you?
I'm doing well just got back from fishing. I caught a huge fish!
That's awesome! I love to go fishing but I'm not very good at it.
It's all about patience and knowing where to go.
I don't have much patience. I think that's why I'm not very good at fishing.
You could always try taking lessons. That might help!
I might do that! I love eating fish so I should probably learn how to catch them.
What's your favorite kind of fish to eat?
I love salmon, trout, and bass. They're all so delicious.
Me too! I love all kinds of fish.
Me too! They're so good for you.
